tasks.label: Android clean caches
args:
set -e
export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home"
flutter clean
rm -rf android/.gradle
rm -rf build
# Remove Kotlin plugin caches under plugin builds that are failing
rm -rf android/app/build
# Optionally prune specific plugin build caches that showed errors
rm -rf build/file_picker build/share_plus
flutter pub get

tasks.label: Rebuild Android after runtime tweaks
args:
set -e
export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home"
flutter pub get
flutter run -d 7304ce4f0506
